tokens.resolved_gloss: physically, to throw (a stone, an arrow) at or away; especially to revere or worship (with extended hands); intensively, to bemoan (by wringing the hands)

tokens.resolved_gloss: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, concealed, i.e. the vanishing point; generally, time out of mind (past or future), i.e. (practically) eternity; frequentatively, adverbial (especially with prepositional prefix) always

tokens.resolved_gloss: kindness; by implication (towards God) piety; rarely (by opposition) reproof, or (subject.) beauty
